recipesJson.name: Brown Shugga'
recipesJson.author: MaxSavage
recipesJson.description:
**BROWN SHUGGGAAA, how come you taste so good.**

**Brown Sugar RY4.**
I personally never got much of a vanilla/caramel vibe from TFA RY4 Double, I get a fuck ton of brown sugar an earthy whatnots. FLV Caramel is brown sugar. End of story. You cannot convince me otherwise. A little HS RY1 for some true tobacco vibes. FW Butter Pecan, just because I love it in my RY4s. Lastly FA Custard Premium, coz fuck it, I like vanilla note and dig how smooth it makes it. If you want more of a custard here, bump it up to 3% or use your favorite custard.
